refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: const ASN1_ITEM *ASN1_ITEM_lookup(const char *name); const ASN1_ITEM *ASN1_ITEM_get(size_t i);

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: ASN1_ITEM_get() returns the ASN1_ITEM with index i. This function returns NULL if the index i is out of range.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: ASN1_ITEM_lookup() and ASN1_ITEM_get() return a valid ASN1_ITEM structure or NULL if an error occurred.
